verses.verse: Now when Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that there was <S%H3426><s%> corn <S%H7668><s%> in Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto his sons <S%H1121><s%>, Why do ye look <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8691><s%> one upon another?

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Behold, I have heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that there is <S%H3426><s%> corn <S%H7668><s%> in Egypt <S%H4714><s%>: get you down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8798><s%> thither, and buy <S%H7666><s%> <S%H8798><s%> for us from thence; that we may live <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and not die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.
And Yosef's <S%H3130><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> brethren <S%H251><s%> went down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to buy <S%H7666><s%> <S%H8800><s%> corn <S%H1250><s%> in Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

But Binyamin <S%H1144><s%>, Yosef's <S%H3130><s%> brother <S%H251><s%>, Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not with his brethren <S%H251><s%>; for he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, Lest peradventure <S%H6435><s%> mischief <S%H611><s%> befall him <S%H7122><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to buy <S%H7666><s%> <S%H8800><s%> corn among <S%H8432><s%> those that came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8802><s%>: for the famine <S%H7458><s%> was in the land <S%H776><s%> of Kanahan <S%H3667><s%>.

And Yosef <S%H3130><s%> was the governor <S%H7989><s%> over the land <S%H776><s%>, and he it was that sold <S%H7666><s%> <S%H8688><s%> to all the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>: and Yosef's <S%H3130><s%> brethren <S%H251><s%> came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and bowed down <S%H7812><s%> <S%H8691><s%> themselves before him with their faces <S%H639><s%> to the earth <S%H776><s%>.

And Yosef <S%H3130><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his brethren <S%H251><s%>, and he knew <S%H5234><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them, but made himself strange <S%H5234><s%> <S%H8691><s%> unto them, and spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> roughly <S%H7186><s%> unto them; and he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto them, Whence <S%H370><s%> come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> ye? And they said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, From the land <S%H776><s%> of Kanahan <S%H3667><s%> to buy <S%H7666><s%> <S%H8800><s%> food <S%H400><s%>.
And Yosef <S%H3130><s%> knew <S%H5234><s%> <S%H8686><s%> his brethren <S%H251><s%>, but they knew <S%H5234><s%> <S%H8689><s%> not him.

And Yosef <S%H3130><s%> remembered <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the dreams <S%H2472><s%> which he dreamed <S%H2492><s%> <S%H8804><s%> of them, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto them, Ye are spies <S%H7270><s%> <S%H8764><s%>; to see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> ye are come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.
And they said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, Nay, my lord <S%H113><s%>, but to buy <S%H7666><s%> <S%H8800><s%> food <S%H400><s%> are thy servants <S%H5650><s%> come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.
We <S%H5168><s%> are all one <S%H259><s%> man's <S%H376><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%>; we are true <S%H3651><s%> men, thy servants <S%H5650><s%> are no spies <S%H7270><s%> <S%H8764><s%>.
And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto them, Nay, but to see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> ye are come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

And they said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Thy servants <S%H5650><s%> are twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> brethren <S%H251><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of one <S%H259><s%> man <S%H376><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Kanahan <S%H3667><s%>; and, behold, the youngest <S%H6996><s%> is this day <S%H3117><s%> with our father <S%H1><s%>, and one <S%H259><s%> is not.

And Yosef <S%H3130><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto them, That is it that I spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> unto you, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Ye are spies <S%H7270><s%> <S%H8764><s%>:

Hereby <S%H2063><s%> ye shall be proved <S%H974><s%> <S%H8735><s%>: By the life <S%H2416><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> ye shall not go forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%> hence, except your youngest <S%H6996><s%> brother <S%H251><s%> come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8800><s%> hither.

Send <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8798><s%> one <S%H259><s%> of you, and let him fetch <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> your brother <S%H251><s%>, and ye shall be kept in prison <S%H631><s%> <S%H8734><s%>, that your words <S%H1697><s%> may be proved <S%H974><s%> <S%H8735><s%>, whether there be any truth <S%H571><s%> in <S%H854><s%> you: or else <S%H3808><s%> by the life <S%H2416><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> surely ye are spies <S%H7270><s%> <S%H8764><s%>.
And he put them all together <S%H622><s%> <S%H8799><s%> into ward <S%H4929><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>.

And Yosef <S%H3130><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto them the third <S%H7992><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>, This do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, and live <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8798><s%>; for I fear <S%H3373><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>:

If ye be true <S%H3651><s%> men, let one <S%H259><s%> of your brethren <S%H251><s%> be bound <S%H631><s%> <S%H8735><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of your prison <S%H4929><s%>: go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%> ye, carry <S%H935><s%> <S%H8685><s%> corn <S%H7668><s%> for the famine <S%H7459><s%> of your houses <S%H1004><s%>:

But bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> your youngest <S%H6996><s%> brother <S%H251><s%> unto me; so shall your words <S%H1697><s%> be verified <S%H539><s%> <S%H8735><s%>, and ye shall not die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%>. And they did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> so.

And they said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> one <S%H376><s%> to another <S%H251><s%>, We are verily <S%H61><s%> guilty <S%H818><s%> concerning our brother <S%H251><s%>, in that <S%H834><s%> we saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the anguish <S%H6869><s%> of his soul <S%H5315><s%>, when he besought <S%H2603><s%> <S%H8692><s%> us, and we would not hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8804><s%>; therefore is this distress <S%H6869><s%> come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> upon us.

And Re'uven <S%H7205><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Spake I <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not unto you, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Do not sin <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against the child <S%H3206><s%>; and ye would not hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8804><s%>? therefore, behold, also his blood <S%H1818><s%> is required <S%H1875><s%> <S%H8738><s%>.
And they knew <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not that Yosef <S%H3130><s%> understood <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8802><s%> them; for he spake unto them by an interpreter <S%H3887><s%> <S%H8688><s%>.

And he turned himself about <S%H5437><s%> <S%H8735><s%> from them, and wept <S%H1058><s%> <S%H8799><s%>; and returned to them again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and communed <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> with them, and took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from them SHim`on <S%H8095><s%>, and bound <S%H631><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him before their eyes <S%H5869><s%>.

Then Yosef <S%H3130><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8762><s%> to fill <S%H4390><s%> <S%H8762><s%> their sacks <S%H3627><s%> with corn <S%H1250><s%>, and to restore <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8687><s%> every man's <S%H376><s%> money <S%H3701><s%> into his sack <S%H8242><s%>, and to give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8800><s%> them provision <S%H6720><s%> for the way <S%H1870><s%>: and thus <S%H3651><s%> did he <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto them.
And they laded <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> their asses <S%H2543><s%> with the corn <S%H7668><s%>, and departed <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thence.

And as one <S%H259><s%> of them opened <S%H6605><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his sack <S%H8242><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8800><s%> his ass <S%H2543><s%> provender <S%H4554><s%> in the inn <S%H4411><s%>, he espied <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his money <S%H3701><s%>; for, behold, it was in his sack's <S%H572><s%> mouth <S%H6310><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto his brethren <S%H251><s%>, My money <S%H3701><s%> is restored <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8717><s%>; and, lo <S%H2009><s%>, it is even in my sack <S%H572><s%>: and their heart <S%H3820><s%> failed <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them, and they were afraid <S%H2729><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%> one <S%H376><s%> to another <S%H251><s%>, What is this that 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> hath done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto us?

And they came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> their father <S%H1><s%> unto the land <S%H776><s%> of Kanahan <S%H3667><s%>, and told <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8686><s%> him all that befell <S%H7136><s%> <S%H8802><s%> unto them; saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

The man <S%H376><s%>, who is the lord <S%H113><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>, spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> roughly <S%H7186><s%> to us, and took <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> us for spies <S%H7270><s%> <S%H8764><s%> of the country <S%H776><s%>.
And we said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, We are true <S%H3651><s%> men; we are no spies <S%H7270><s%> <S%H8764><s%>:

We be twelve <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8147><s%> brethren <S%H251><s%>, sons <S%H1121><s%> of our father <S%H1><s%>; one <S%H259><s%> is not, and the youngest <S%H6996><s%> is this day <S%H3117><s%> with our father <S%H1><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Kanahan <S%H3667><s%>.

And the man <S%H376><s%>, the lord <S%H113><s%> of the country <S%H776><s%>, said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto us, Hereby shall I know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that ye are true <S%H3651><s%> men; leave <S%H3240><s%> <S%H8685><s%> one <S%H259><s%> of your brethren <S%H251><s%> here with me, and take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8798><s%> food for the famine <S%H7459><s%> of your households <S%H1004><s%>, and be gone <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%>:

And bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8685><s%> your youngest <S%H6996><s%> brother <S%H251><s%> unto me: then shall I know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that ye are no spies <S%H7270><s%> <S%H8764><s%>, but that ye are true <S%H3651><s%> men: so will I deliver <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> you your brother <S%H251><s%>, and ye shall traffick <S%H5503><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%>.

And it came to pass as they emptied <S%H7324><s%> <S%H8688><s%> their sacks <S%H8242><s%>, that, behold, every man's <S%H376><s%> bundle <S%H6872><s%> of money <S%H3701><s%> was in his sack <S%H8242><s%>: and when both they and their father <S%H1><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the bundles <S%H6872><s%> of money <S%H3701><s%>, they were afraid <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> their father <S%H1><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto them, Me have ye bereaved <S%H7921><s%> <S%H8765><s%> of my children: Yosef <S%H3130><s%> is not, and SHim`on <S%H8095><s%> is not, and ye will take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Binyamin <S%H1144><s%> away: all these things are against me.

And Re'uven <S%H7205><s%> spake <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto his father <S%H1><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Slay <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8686><s%> my two <S%H8147><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%>, if I bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> him not to thee: deliver <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8798><s%> him into my hand <S%H3027><s%>, and I will bring him to thee again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8686><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, My son <S%H1121><s%> shall not go down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with you; for his brother <S%H251><s%> is dead <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and he is left <S%H7604><s%> <S%H8738><s%> alone: if mischief <S%H611><s%> befall <S%H7122><s%> <S%H8804><s%> him by the way <S%H1870><s%> in the which ye go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, then shall ye bring down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8689><s%> my gray hairs <S%H7872><s%> with sorrow <S%H3015><s%> to the grave <S%H7585><s%>.
